plays.text: Penalty to Mathieu Dandenault 2 minutes for Slashing Brad Larsen
Goal scored by Steve Reinprecht assisted by Peter Forsberg and Darius Kasparaitis
Penalty to Brian Willsie 2 minutes for Interference Dominik Hasek
Penalty to Dominik Hasek 2 minutes for Unsportsmanlike Conduct(opposing player not identified) served by Darren McCarty
Penalty to Chris Drury 2 minutes for Interference Brendan Shanahan
Penalty to Tomas Holmstrom 2 minutes for Tripping Rob Blake
Penalty to Milan Hejduk 2 minutes for Obstruction - Holding Jiri Fischer
Penalty to Jiri Fischer 2 minutes for Interference Steve Reinprecht
Penalty to Joe Sakic 2 minutes for Interference Pavel Datsyuk
Goal scored by Steve Yzerman assisted by Brett Hull and Sergei Fedorov
2 minute Bench Penalty for Too Many Men on the Ice served by Brian Willsie
Goal scored by Peter Forsberg assisted by Brian Willsie and Darius Kasparaitis
